story_parts.text: A giraffe was walking through the jungle when he came across a lion. The lion said to the giraffe, "I'm going to eat you!" The giraffe said, "No, you're not! I'm the king of the jungle!" The lion said, "No, I am!" They argued back and forth until they finally decided to ask the elephant. The elephant said, "I don't know, but you're both wrong! I'm the king of the jungle

next_options.0: The giraffe and the lion decide to ask the monkey who is the king of the jungle
next_options.1: The giraffe and the lion continue to argue until they get tired and go to sleep
